Method Detail

addDependency

public void addDependency(String optionA,
                          String optionB)
Adds a dependency. If option A is present then option B will be required when parsing command line arguments. Please use addOption(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, boolean) to define optionA and optionB first.

Parameters:
optionA -
optionB - Option B is required if option A is present

addOption

public void addOption(String option,
                      String valueType,
                      String description,
                      boolean isRequired)
Creates an Option

Parameters:
option - Option name
valueType - Value type
description - Description of the option
isRequired - Whether this option is required or optional

addOption

public void addOption(String option,
                      String valueType,
                      String description,
                      boolean isRequired,
                      boolean hasArg)
Creates an Option

Parameters:
option - Option name
valueType - Value type
description - Description of the option
isRequired - Whether this option is required or optional
hasArg - Whether this option takes argument

foundOption

public boolean foundOption(String option)
Please use #parseCommandLine before calling this method.

Parameters:
option - Option name
Returns:
Whether the given option is present in the command line arguments
